top_categories.workout_context: 150 miles. Your legs will beg to quit after 120. This trains the power output you need from mile 130 onward.
Hellhole Gravel Grind Stage Race's South Carolina rolling gravel rewards steady threshold power. Surging and recovering costs more watts than just holding.
Hellhole Gravel Grind Stage Race's South Carolina rolling gravel, Multi-day stage race forces constant power changes. Surge over the rough stuff, settle on the smooth, repeat for 150 miles.
Race-pace efforts that mimic Hellhole Gravel Grind Stage Race's demands. Pacing, fueling, and tactical decisions under fatigue. Practice the race before October.
88–92% FTP is where you'll spend the hardest sustained miles of Hellhole Gravel Grind Stage Race. Train it until it feels boring.
150 miles rewards fat oxidation. This volume work shifts your fuel mix so you're still burning fat at hour 5, not bonking at hour 3.
Every hard session works better with a bigger aerobic base. At 150 miles, base fitness is the difference between racing and surviving.
At Hellhole Gravel Grind Stage Race, surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding. Over-unders train exactly that.
Endurance with intensity spikes baked in. Exactly what 6,000ft of climbing on South Carolina rolling gravel does to your power file on race day.
6,000ft of climbing means repeated surges above threshold. VO2max work is how you survive the fifth climb, not just the first.
Tempo is Hellhole Gravel Grind Stage Race's race pace. The wattage you'll hold for 150 miles on South Carolina rolling gravel. Train it until it's automatic.
How long can you hold 105% FTP before you blow? At Hellhole Gravel Grind Stage Race, that number decides whether you bridge or get dropped.

race_overlay.nutrition: Ultra-distance fueling for 150 miles: 80–100g carbs/hour from mile 1 — don’t wait until you’re hungry. Practice your exact race-day nutrition in every long training ride. Carry backup calories. 150 miles burns 8,000–12,000+ calories — you cannot replace them all, but you must try.
race_overlay.terrain: Mixed terrain at Hellhole Gravel Grind Stage Race requires surface adaptability. Include weekly rides on south carolina rolling gravel to build confidence. Expect: south carolina rolling gravel, multi-day stage race, regional event.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on Durability, TT Threshold, and Gravel Specific to prepare you for 150 miles of south carolina rolling gravel in Jamestown, South Carolina.
